channel.title: CVE Feed for ESET, spol. s r.o. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ESET, spol. s r.o. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-2003|2024-06-21T14:18:48.023Z -- eset%2C%20spol.%20s%20r.o. -- eset%20nod32%20antivirus
item.description: Local privilege escalation vulnerability allowed an attacker to misuse ESET's file operations during a restore operation from quarantine.

item.title: CVE-2023-7043|2024-01-31T12:52:10.301Z -- eset%2C%20spol.%20s%20r.o. -- eset%20endpoint%20security
item.description:
Unquoted service path in ESET products allows to
drop a prepared program to a specific location and run on boot with the
NT AUTHORITY\NetworkService permissions.

item.title: CVE-2024-0353|2024-02-15T07:40:24.786Z -- eset%2C%20spol.%20s%20r.o. -- eset%20nod32%20antivirus
item.description: Local privilege escalation vulnerability potentially allowed an attacker to misuse ESET’s file operations to delete files without having proper permission.

item.title: CVE-2024-2003|2024-06-21T07:20:03.749Z -- eset%2C%20spol.%20s%20r.o. -- eset%20nod32%20antivirus
item.description: Local privilege escalation vulnerability allowed an attacker to misuse ESET's file operations during a restore operation from quarantine.
